title: China's Census Shows Population Barely Grew in 10 Years as Births Plummet
content:
1. China's Census Shows Population Barely Grew in 10 Years as Births Plummet  The New York Times
  2. China’s census shows population growth slowed  CNBC
  3. China’s Census Highlights a Looming Population Problem  The Wall Street Journal
  4. 1.4B but no more? China's population growth closer to zero  The Associated Press
  5. China's population grows to 1.412 billion in 2020, but likely to 'decline as early as 2022'  Global Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国の国勢調査によると、出生数が減少したため、人口は10年間でほとんど増加していないことが判明
中国的人口普查显示人口在10年内几乎没有增长，因为出生率急剧下降
中國的人口普查顯示人口在10年內幾乎沒有增長，因爲出生率急劇下降
